void GrPolygonUberUVMapper::PlaceCoplanarGroups ( std::vector< GrPolygonUberPatchGroup * >  groups,
EPLANE  mappingPlane 
)

this maps groups from a very large planar mapping into an ubertexture. Note that for this to work, everything must be mapped onto a single plane.

void GrPolygonUberUVMapper::PlaceGroupsByPath ( std::vector< GrPolygonUberPatchGroup * >  groups,
const MVec3 *  path,
int  numLines,
float  stepSize 
)

This maps arbitrary patches into an ubertexture using a path as a guide for packing ubertexture data. Note that the lines in the path must be sorted as desired. The step size is how far the eye position moves between packing checks.

void GrPolygonUberUVMapper::PlaceGroupsSlow ( std::vector< GrPolygonUberPatchGroup * >  groups,
EPLANE  movementPlane,
float  gridEntrySize 
)

public methods

This maps arbitrary patches into an ubertexture, trying to preserve spatial locality within the map based on spatial locality in world space.

scale to convert UVs to patch boundary increments.

mask to calculate the local grid and hyper grid positions for each patch.

an vector component lookup table for each plane's X and Y.

a useful value for scaling world space to grid space.

pack all groups into the patches vector.

get the current group.

get the number of patches in the current group.

iterate through each group and pack them into a vector.

get the current patch.

calculate the patch's grid location.

calculate and store the hyper grid position.

calculate and store the local grid position.

sort patches based on their grid positions.

get the total number of patches.

scan through groups in each hyper-tile to determine the largest patch group.

get the current patch.

try to pack the current patch into the mapping.

create a new mapping and add the patch to it.
